Whenever this or another snow permanent you control enters, surveil 1.
Sacrifice this enchantment: Invoke X, where X is the number of snow permanents in your graveyard. Activate only as a sorcery. [i](Remove X -1/-1 counters from an Avatar you control. If you don't control an Avatar, create a 20/20 Avatar creature token with nineteen -1/-1 counters first.)[/i]
